lambdynlights.menu.canvas.1: Disabling entities dynamic lighting is recommended with Canvas!
lambdynlights.menu.canvas.2: Dynamic lighting with Canvas is currently performance heavy!
lambdynlights.menu.tabs.debug.descriptio: For modders, in case of tricky bugs.
lambdynlights.menu.title: LambDynamicLights Settings
lambdynlights.option.debug.active_dynami: Show in the world every currently active cells in the dynamic lighting engine.
lambdynlights.option.debug.cell_display_: Display Radius of Dynamic Lighting Cells
lambdynlights.option.debug.display_behav: Display Dynamic Light Behavior Bounding Box
Show in the world the bounding box of dynamic light behaviors.
lambdynlights.option.debug.display_dynam: Show in the world every chunk rebuilds caused by dynamic lighting updates.
lambdynlights.option.debug.light_level_r: Display Radius of Dynamic Light Level
Enables the dynamic lighting of Beacon or End Gateway beams. They should rarely update.
lambdynlights.option.light_sources.firef: Enables the dynamic lighting of firefly particles emitted by Firefly Bushes.
lambdynlights.option.light_sources.guard: Enables the dynamic lighting of the lasers shot by Guardians.
lambdynlights.tooltip.creeper_lighting:
Sets the dynamic lighting mode for Creepers.
- %s disables Creeper dynamic lighting.
- %s sets a constant luminance.
- %s sets a dynamic luminance.
lambdynlights.tooltip.entities: Enables entities dynamic lighting. Note: it's always active for players.
lambdynlights.tooltip.mode.1: Enables dynamic lights. For example, if enabled, a torch held by a player will light up the area.
lambdynlights.tooltip.mode.2: %s and %s will lag a bit behind but minimizes light updates.
lambdynlights.tooltip.self_light_source: Enables first-person dynamic lighting. It's recommended to disable this if you're using shaders that has their own dynamic lighting.
lambdynlights.tooltip.tnt_lighting:
Sets the dynamic lighting mode for TNT.
- %s disables TNT dynamic lighting.
- %s sets a constant luminance.
- %s sets a dynamic luminance.
lambdynlights.tooltip.water_sensitive: Enables the check for water-sensitive light sources. This means that some items will not emit light while being submerged in water.
